resources.string: Can you beat the machine?!? Challenge the machine learning AI to guess the image or word before it beats your puny human mind and takes over the world(okay probably not, but you at least wanna beat it for bragging rights no?)
You have won against the AI!
You have lost against the AI!
You have tied against the AI!
That was your last round. Your score was:
Are you sure you want to abandon your progress and quit?

string-array.name: ai_quips
string-array.item: Huh... I have no idea
Is this even a drawing???
I\'m so moved by the art I can\'t think of an answer...
Fire the artists this isn\'t fair!
If this was 1\'s and 0\'s I\'d totally beat you
I could create better art in ms paint
Picasso would be proud of this... if proud meant disappointed
The artists better not quit their day job
The imagery moves me to tears... of pain!
Such soothing hues... do I like it?
1,2,3,4, I\'ve no guesses anymore

string-array.name: ai_unsure
string-array.item: I think it\'s \
No wait it\s
Could be
It\'s obviously
Hmm maybe
A bird? A Plane? No it\'s
Judging by the Kandinsky like colours it must be
Brilliant it\'s
I\'ve got it it\'s
I dunno how about
I\'ve spent millions of hours preparing for this moment to guess

resources.string: Victory! I\'ve got it! The word is
